title: Injury Updates: Van Aert ‘Feeling a Bit like Myself Again’; Kämna out of ICU; No Surgery for Vine’s Spinal Fractures
content:
Good news for Wout van Aert, Lennard Kämna, Jay Vine after spate of horrific crashes rippled through pro peloton.

Read the full article at Injury Updates: Van Aert ‘Feeling a Bit like Myself Again’; Kämna out of ICU; No Surgery for Vine’s Spinal Fractures on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
